scripts.pocketbase:create-migration: docker compose exec pocketbase /pb/pocketbase migrate create $1
scripts.pocketbase:migrate-up: docker compose exec pocketbase /pb/pocketbase migrate up
scripts.pocketbase:migrate-down: docker compose exec pocketbase /pb/pocketbase migrate down $1
scripts.pocketbase:migrate-collections: docker compose exec pocketbase /pb/pocketbase migrate collections
scripts.pocketbase:history-sync: docker compose exec pocketbase /pb/pocketbase migrate history-sync
scripts.docker-compose:up: docker compose up --detach --build && pnpm run pocketbase:copy-types
